title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1225.43 - Vehicle operators to be properly licensed
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1225.43 - Vehicle operators to be properly licensed

State Regulations

No person shall operate an automotive vehicle in a
truck terminal without a motor vehicle operator's or chauffeur's license issued
by a State bureau of motor vehicles, permitting the operation by such person of
the particular type of vehicle operated by him. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1225.43

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
